Reference

All functions

all_optimizers

All optimizers list.

generate_files_opt_report()

Report possible optimizations in `.R` files.

generate_folder_opt_report()

Report possible optimizations in folder containing `.R` files.

generate_text_opt_report()

Report possible optimizations in `.R` code snippet.

max_optimizers

Max optimizers list.

opt_common_subexpr()

Optimizer: Common Subexpression Elimination.

opt_cond_thread()

Optimizer: Conditional Threading.

opt_constant_folding()

Optimizer: Constant Folding.

opt_constant_propagation()

Optimizer: Constant Propagation.

opt_dead_code()

Optimizer: Dead Code Elimination.

opt_dead_expr()

Optimizer: Dead Expression Elimination.

opt_dead_store()

Optimizer: Dead Store Elimination.

opt_loop_invariant()

Optimizer: Loop-invariant Code Motion.

opt_memory_alloc()

Optimizer: Memory Allocation.

optimize_files()

Optimize `.R` files.

optimize_folder()

Optimize a folder with `.R` files.

optimize_text()

Optimize text containing code.

rco_gui()

rco GUI selector.
